name: financial-statement-visualization
description: Web application for visualizing financial statements from public companies

scripts.dev: npm run dev --workspace=frontend & npm run dev --workspace=backend
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=frontend && npm run build --workspace=backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=frontend && npm run lint --workspace=backend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=frontend && npm run type-check --workspace=backend
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=backend && npm run test --workspace=frontend
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:unit --workspace=backend && npm run test:unit --workspace=frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage --workspace=backend && npm run test:coverage --workspace=frontend
